questions.question_text: “Satpuruṣhno je prasang e ja ____________ viṣhe draḍh prīti thavānu kāraṇ chhe.”
questions.explanation: The Vachanamrut states that association with the Satpurush is the cause of firm love for Parameshwar.

questions.question_text: Āvā Sādhune manmā sambhārīe to ____________ baḷī jāy ne vātu sāmbhaḷīe to kānnā pāp baḷī jāy ne darshan karīe to ānkhnā pāp baḷī jāy, em mahimā jāṇavo.
questions.explanation: Swamini Vato states that by remembering such a Sadhu, the sins of the mind are burned away.

questions.question_text: Kāmdughā kalpataru, pāras ____________ chār; Sant samān e eke nahi, me manmā karyo vichār.
questions.explanation: Bhaktachintamani states 'Kāmdughā kalpataru, pāras chintāmaṇi chār; Sant samān e eke nahi, me manmā karyo vichār.'

questions.question_text: Alp sukh emā rahyu, maḷī ṭaḷī jāy chhe eh; Sant sevye sukh ūpaje, rahe ____________ eh.
questions.explanation: Bhaktachintamani states 'Sant sevye sukh ūpaje, rahe akhanḍ aṭaḷ eh.'

questions.question_text: Jevī parokṣh devne viṣhe jīvne pratīti chhe tevī jo ____________ Harine viṣhe āve, to jeṭalā arth prāpt thavānā kahyā chhe teṭalā sarve arth tene prāpt thāy chhe.
questions.explanation: Vachanamrut Gadhada Antya 2 states that if one has the same faith in the manifest Guru as in the indirect God, then he attains all the benefits.

questions.question_text: Yasya deve parābhaktir, yathā deve tathā gurau | Tasyaite kathitā ____________, prakāshante mahātmanaha ||
questions.explanation: Shvetashvatar Upanishad states 'Tasyaite kathitā hyarthāhā, prakāshante mahātmanaha'.
